title: Executive Order 12407-Federal Regional Councils
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and statutes of the United States of America, and in order to eliminate a mechanism for interagency and intergovernmental coordination which is no longer needed, it is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 12314, establishing the Federal Regional Councils, is revoked.
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 10:33 a.m., February 23, 1983]
citation: Ronald Reagan, Executive Order 12407-Federal Regional Councils Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/262563
